title: Can anyone be a journalist? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Just like every other profession, journalists must be trained in how to ethically gather news and report it. Some need training in how to write with clarity. Some need to learn how to operate cameras or edit video or audio. It also requires discipline as you cannot reveal your personal opinions or insert them into stories. You must also be dedicated enough to answer that 3 am phone call and willing to rush to the plane crash or earthquake, or whatever happened. You must be bold and brave, because people can and will threaten you and try to intimidate you. You also have to go into places that are dangerous, such as natural disasters like hurricanes. You have to have the highest moral standards as those who would like to discredit you will search for weaknesses. They will look for ways to get you off of their story and try to keep you from revealing their secrets. They may offer bribes to issue threats. You have to be strong. Not just anyone can be a journalist.

No, everyone can't be a journalist Its need proper knowledge of the term “journalist" which have many different fields like reporter, anchor, cameraman, script writer, editor etc. They all are known as journalist if they are working for media. If a person is sharing a information to media it doesn't mean that he or she is a journalist. He or she needs to have the proper knowledge of Journalism . According to our education system graduating in journalism and mass communication are eligible to be journalist.

I think if anyone applied themselves, they could be a journalist but certain strengths and interests are needed to be successful in the industry. People skills, great writing skills, and an extroverted are pretty necessary character traits for the industry. So although, yes, anyone COULD be a journalist, not everyone will be able to thrive in the same ways.

Of course, but it takes dedication and sacrifice! You often have to work for next to no pay initially, but there is a lot of back-end reward. You just need to find a niche that fits you best and run with it. Focus on smaller blogs or even start your own blog to launch your career and hone your skills.
No, not everyone can even write a decent letter. One has to have the skill or knows the convention of grammar, passion and flair.
With a college degree and a job, sure!
